context.p: A deleted project within the Capacity Planner is a project that is currently in use in a pod but you wish to plan its removal. A per plan project within the Capacity Planner is a project that has been planned to be removed from one pod and moved to another.
Use the Capacity Planner to create or update a plan with deleted projects and per plan projects for efficient cloud resource allocation

li.xref: Delete a Project from a Cloud Pod

prereq.p: To create or update a plan successfully the user must have the following:

ul.li: Relevant Cloud Pods already created in the tool
Relevant Projects already created in the tool
Relevant Deployment Types already created in the tool
Relevant Teams already created in the tool

info.p: Click the Create new plan button from the plans page or click on the plan you wish to edit.

step.cmd: Delete a Project from a Cloud Pod

info.p: Click the X button on the project you wish to delete When you click the button the project will become grey and the X button will change to a + which will allow the project to be re-added to the plan. This deleted project will be added to the per plan project list below the backlog prokect list. The project can be re-added using this list.

Navigate to the pod you wish to add a project to. From the per plan project list select the project you want to add. When selected press the + button beside the list This will add the project to the pod. The project will be highlighted to help differentiate it from the live projects. Note: This project cannot be re-added in the original pod but will remain there greyed out till the project is removed from the new pod.

result.p: A Plan is created or updated with deleted projects and per plan projects in the Capacity Planner.
